actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Farm Labor Contractor Registration Act of 1963 to exempt contractors of workers engaged in custom cutting or combine operations in connection with the harvesting of grains and contractors of workers engaged in the shearing of sheep, or baling of hay.

summary.text: Exempts from the Farm Labor Contractor Registration Act of 1963 contractors of workers engaged in custom cutting or combine operations in connection with the harvesting of grains, or in the shearing of sheep, or baling of hay.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Farm Labor Contractor Registration Act of 1963 to exempt contractors of workers engaged in custom cutting or combine operations in connection with the harvesting of grains and contractors of workers engaged in the shearing of sheep, or baling of hay.
